## SuggestMarkParams.setMarkRemoved() method

When managing suggestions with marks it is possible to remove a mark without the change reflecting in the prosemirror state. This method should be used when removing a suggestion if you are using prosemirror `Marks` to identify the suggestion.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setMarkRemoved(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
